elements.name: question1
elements.title: ... the instructions are unclear or ambiguous?
elements.correctAnswer: There is room for interpretation. At best, the order is executed differently than intended.

elements.name: question2
elements.title: ... the arrangements are incomplete?
elements.correctAnswer: Important information is missing. The order is delayed, executed incorrectly or only partially.

elements.name: question3
elements.title: ... the orders are inappropriate?
elements.correctAnswer: There is a risk that the person performing the task is over- or under-challenged. Both can lead to lack of concentration, mistakes, accidents or frustration. People who are under- or overworked no longer enjoy coming to work or even call in sick. The mood in the workplace deteriorates.

elements.name: question4
elements.title: ... the orders are not justifiable or difficult to justify?
elements.correctAnswer: The person carrying out the task cannot understand the purpose of the assignment or why the task has been delegated to them. This leads to a lack of understanding, lack of motivation and frustration.
